title: John Scharbach from Give and Shining Life Zine
itunes:title: John Scharbach from Give and Shining Life Zine
description:
Fresh back from quite a time in the UK, I couldn't take a week off because frankly...this conversation was too cool not to share immediately. John Scharbach from the defunct DC hardcore band, Give, is on the pod this week. He also runs a great publishing company entitled Shining Life Zine that you gotta check out as well. We go deep on pursing art, skateboarding and his life in the military. Peep it and enjoy! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
